profile: Bronson Johnson Seamless Eavestroughs has quickly become one of Ottawa's top choices for your water evacuation requirements!  We specialize in Eavestrough (Gutter) installation.  BJSE also provides Leaf Screen (Leaf Guard) protection.  We have exclusive rights to GT Premium Micro Leaf Screen which is ideal for metal roofing systems.   Our mission is to be Referred by our Customers, Revered by our Competitors and Respected by our Community.
products: We only use 0.032" thick 5 inch Seamless Eavestrough; Exclusive rights to the Hidden Hanger used in our installations; Leaf Guard, Leaf Screen; Environmentally friendly Rain Barrel installation.  Also, ask about our product that eliminates  "Tiger Stripes" which occur on white and light coloured eaves.
services: Eavestrough Installation, Eavestrough Repair, Eavestrough Cleaning, Removal of Old Troughs, Tiger Stripe cleaning.
brands: Englert product line, GT Premium Microscreen Leaf Guard, T-Rex (Alu-Rex) Leaf Screen.
specialities: B.J.S.E is the only company in Ottawa to specialize in the installation of.032" thick Aluminum Eavestroughs which is significantly stronger than standard .023", .024" and .027" material used by our competitors. The advantage of the thicker gauge is strength and integrity at the same price!
payment_method: Cash, Cheque, Credit Card and e-transfer
diplomas: All of our crew members have completed the Fall Protection Certification
warranty_terms: 5 year warranty on workmanship and 20 year manufacturer's warranty on materials.
name: Bronson Johnson Seamless Eavestroughs

profile:
COVID-19 update:
We are open to maintain your rainwater management systems, essential to protecting your property from the elements.
Please know that the health of our families, your families, and the community is of prime concern to us. Therefore we are observing all government guidance on keeping one another healthy while we maintain your properties.
Please contact us for all your eavestrough needs. If we can not provide the service requested at this time we can try to follow up with you as guidelines change.
 
 
Welcome to Eaves Experts Ottawa! We provide high-quality eavestrough and rain gutter cleaning, repair, maintenance, accessories, and installation services. Our emphasis is first on our customers, not speed or convenience. You, our customers, is what will make us succeed!
 
Call us for a free quote today at 613 601 2234!

 
Also, check out our Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/eavesexpertsottawa/

profile:
Remember Me Roofing Inc services residential and commercial properties in the Ottawa region, offering industry leading 50 Year Warranties through our certification as GAF Contractors.

Our highly rated team takes pride in delivering quality workmanship and providing outstanding customer service to every homeowner. We emphasize honesty and integrity and are proud of the reputation we have built in our community and our commitment to give back.

Every member of our staff strives to make Remember Me Roofing a leader in the industry. Beyond providing a service, we are looking to build relationships by committing to being reliable and respectful to our customers. Our homeowners depend on us and we in turn give everything we have to each roof.

profile:
COVID-19 Precautions
These precautions include:

We are fully equipped with masks and shields and wear them as required.
Our fleet of trucks is fully equipped with hand sanitizer which our employees use as often as possible throughout the day.
In between jobs we also sanitize all our equipment.
The team wears gloves while working at your home.
We are introducing a NEW window cleaning solution.
This will not only clean your windows but also sanitize them at the same time.
Our soft wash solution as always sanitizes and cleans your home at the same time.

A cleaning company is more than a truck and some equipment. It’s a team you trust and count on to get the job done right the first time. Free estimates, trained professionals, and top-tier equipment all locally owned and operated. 

We are Clear Ottawa and we’re glad you decided to stop by. We do what we our way, and we’re excited to show you what makes us great at it. Our team loves your property as much as you do. Our local, friendly, and professional team is eager to prove it to you.

We’ve been providing the Ottawa-Gatineau area with spectacular service for as long as we’ve been in business. Steady business has kept us both busy and happy, but what we have to say and offer continues to evolve all the same.

Whether you’re a homeowner, public servant, realtor, or small business: we’re ready for you. If you need cleaning solutions from qualified professionals, we want to hear from you.
products:
We use Shaklee home cleaning products for your home interior. This company is one of the few environmental friendly that been around for over 50 years. In other words, their non-toxic, environmental friendly claims are back up with scientific evidence. 

We also use proteam vacuums. This is the only vacuum manufacturer in the world that is a sponsor of the American Lung association. Their vacuums have such a high level of filtration that they actually promote clean air together.
services: We offer Home, Office and Commercial sanitizing services. Along with residential and commercial window, eavestrough, and siding cleaning . Along with Softwashing of vinyl, aluminum, stucco and interlocking.
payment_method: Cash, email transfer and credit card
name: Clear Ottawa Windows & Cleaning Services

profile:
Landmark Home Solutions have been supplying comfort and peace of mind to homeowners across Ontario since 1987. We’re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!
 
We’re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years we’ve been in business, we’ve never had an unresolved complaint. We’re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.
 
We’re also proud to say that our windows are Energy Star certified.  As you probably know, the international Energy Star symbol is a simple way for consumers to identify products that are among the most energy-efficient on the market. We also offer financing through TD Canada Trust, ensuring that our customers have a trustworthy partner too.
Based in St. Catharines, Ontario, 

Landmark Home Solutions is proud to represent our Canadian heritage in all that we do.  Our windows are made right here, so you know you’re getting the best quality windows in the world.

profile:
MARKELANGELO'S ROOFING serves the greater Ottawa area.  We are a professional and trustworthy company with a proven track record. We have fully trained, certified employees who specialize in specific installation procedures and focus 100% on quality control to ensure your satisfaction with the final product. 
 
As a testament to our exceptional level of service, our clients eagerly recommend us to friends and family. In fact, we built Markelangelo’s solely through word of mouth.

We are very aware of how our business impacts the environment. We contribute by participating in recycling programs available at local landfills. All garbage, shingles, metal and wood are separated before we take our dump trailers to these landfills. Each waste product is then put into its appropriate area of the landfill and processed. We save approximately a thousand tonnes of material being buried in landfills every year.

profile:
We Got It Covered Roofing is a family run company with 30 years experience. We pride ourselves in doing things for our clients the way we would do our own family! We will consult with the home owner and come up with the best quality products for the job. Our workmanship is guaranteed and our service is remarkable. We offer free estimates and we are fully insured. We are saddened by the reputation roofers/renovators have made for themselves over the years and we are here to change that!
If you want excellent customer service/care and amazing workmanship please call for a quote today!

profile:
We clean gutters; and that's all we do.

Ottawa Gutter Cleaning utilizes a gutter vacuum system which enables us to quickly and safely clean your eavestroughs. Our vacuum gutter cleaning approach enables us to reach up to four storeys and gives us the ability to handle just about any job.

We are dedicated to providing you with the best service. Our professional team will get the job done quickly and effectively. Have us service your home today, because you have better things to do with your time.
